hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOLC_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, PM_CODE, EOLC_EOLS_PM_CODE, EOLC_NO, EOLC_LEFT_BRACKET, EOLC_COLUMN_CODE, EOLC_OPERATE, EOLC_VALUE, EOLC_RIGHT_BRACKET, EOLC_CONTROL_LOGIC FROM EO_LCL_CONDITION WHERE 1=1 AND REC_STATUS = 0 <<AND PM_CODE = :pmCode>> <<AND EOLC_EOLS_PM_CODE = :eolcEolsPmCode>> <<AND EOLC_NO = :eolcNo>> <<AND EOLC_LEFT_BRACKET = :eolcLeftBracket>> <<AND EOLC_COLUMN_CODE = :eolcColumnCode>> <<AND EOLC_OPERATE = :eolcOperate>> <<AND EOLC_VALUE = :eolcValue>> <<AND EOLC_RIGHT_BRACKET = :eolcRightBracket>> <<AND EOLC_CONTROL_LOGIC = :eolcControlLogic>> ORDER BY EOLC_NO ASC
